trans-unit.source: Retrieves the amount of time that the mouse cursor must hover over an item before it is selected

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the amount of time that the mouse cursor must hover over an item before it is selected

target.mrk: Retrieves the amount of time that the mouse cursor must hover over an item before it is selected

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of time, in milliseconds, that the mouse cursor must hover over an item before it is selected. If the return value is (DWORD)-1, then the hover time is the default hover time.

seg-source.mrk: Returns the amount of time, in milliseconds, that the mouse cursor must hover over an item before it is selected.
If the return value is (DWORD)-1, then the hover time is the default hover time.

target.mrk: Returns the amount of time, in milliseconds, that the mouse cursor must hover over an item before it is selected.
If the return value is (DWORD)-1, then the hover time is the default hover time.

trans-unit.source: The hover time only affects list-view controls that have the $LVS_EX_TRACKSELECT, $LVS_EX_ONECLICKACTIVATE or $LVS_EX_TWOCLICKACTIVATE extended list-view style.

seg-source.mrk: The hover time only affects list-view controls that have the $LVS_EX_TRACKSELECT, $LVS_EX_ONECLICKACTIVATE or $LVS_EX_TWOCLICKACTIVATE extended list-view style.

target.mrk: The hover time only affects list-view controls that have the $LVS_EX_TRACKSELECT, $LVS_EX_ONECLICKACTIVATE or $LVS_EX_TWOCLICKACTIVATE extended list-view style.

trans-unit.source: An item is about to be deleted

seg-source.mrk: An item is about to be deleted

target.mrk: An item is about to be deleted

trans-unit.source: Sent by a list-view control when the user moves the mouse over an item

seg-source.mrk: Sent by a list-view control when the user moves the mouse over an item

target.mrk: Sent by a list-view control when the user moves the mouse over an item

trans-unit.source: allow the list view to perform its normal track select processing.

seg-source.mrk: allow the list view to perform its normal track select processing.

target.mrk: allow the list view to perform its normal track select processing.

trans-unit.source: Return 1 ; the item will not be selected.

seg-source.mrk: Return 1 ; the item will not be selected.

target.mrk: Return 1 ; the item will not be selected.

trans-unit.source: Sent by a list-view control when the user clicks an item with the left mouse button

trans-unit.source: Return 1 ; not to allow the default processing
